m_szDocTitle: ZAP and Jonway Auto Launches New Model E-3D SUV At Jonway's... -- SANTA ROSA, Calif., Sept. 30, 2015 /PRNewswire/ --
m_szDocSumamry: ZAP- Jonway New 3-Door EV ZAP-Jonway new 3-Door EV Interior SANTA ROSA, Calif., Sept. 30, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- ZAP (ZAAP: OTC) – ZAP and Jonway Auto launches its new model E-3D SUV at its EV product launch dealership meeting held recently with its network of over 50 dealerships nationwide in China.  The new E-3D SUV model has been designed specifically to address China's dense metro city's EV demands in the face of regulations enforced by the government to limit gasoline vehicle licenses for the densely populated cities. Jonway Auto's network of nationwide dealers has been pushing for this cos
